creator: Yonatan@xpert.com
text:
The Sample is
<LimitExcept POST GET>
Require valid-user
<LimitExcept> 

Where it should obviously be
<LimitExcept POST GET>
Require valid-user
</LimitExcept>

Thanks, it's fixed now in CVS for the 2.0 and 2.1 versions of this document (and also for the 
German translation) and should be on the website soon.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
